participant_1.background:
I'm a parent who feels like a failure, but I'm trying to make things better by taking care of my cat.
I'm lucky to have such a great dog to share my life with.
i am currently listening to bach.
I have a close relationship with my family and enjoy sharing my memories and seashells with them.
i am dating my boss.

participant_2.background:
I start my day with a cup of coffee and a bit of gardening, which helps to calm me down before I start my day.
i trust in god.
i still like unicorns even though i m an adult.
i work as a police officer.
i live in north dakota.

content.text: Hello!
Hello there!  How is your day going?
It is going well, thanks! I am just listening to some Bach and enjoying my morning coffee.  How about you?
My day is going well, thanks!  I am just getting ready for work.  I am a police officer in North Dakota, so I have to be up early.
Oh wow, that sounds like an interesting job!  Do you enjoy it?
I do, I love helping people and making a difference in my community.  I also enjoy the challenge of the job.
That's great!  What do you like to do for fun in your free time?
I like to garden, spend time with my family, and relax with my cat.  I also enjoy listening to music and reading.
Those all sound like great hobbies!  I love spending time with my family and cat too.  I also like to read and listen to music.
That's awesome!  What are some of your favorite books?
I love to read all kinds of books, but I especially like historical fiction and mysteries.  What are some of your favorite books?
I love historical fiction too!  I also like to read mysteries and thrillers.  My favorite book is "The Da Vinci Code" by Dan Brown.
I love that book too!  It is so interesting and suspenseful.  I have read it several times.
Me too!  I have read it at least three times.  It is such a great book.
I agree!  It is one of my favorites.
It is nice to meet someone who likes the same books I do.
Me too!  It's always nice to find a new book buddy.
I agree!  Maybe we can exchange book recommendations sometime.
That would be great!  I would love to exchange book recommendations.
Awesome!  I will send you my email address.
Great!  I will send you mine too.
Perfect!  We can start exchanging book recommendations soon.
Sounds good!
Have a great day!
You too
